participant_1.background:
I am a circus performer, following in my family's footsteps.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I love spending time with my family on special occasions.
i am an excellent student.
i go to dance lessons with my boyfriend.
I'm not a big fan of social media, but I'll make an effort to use it to build my reputation at work.

participant_2.background:
I do laundry about once a week.
i just graduated high school with honors.
i m the youngest of five.
I took George to the park for a picnic and we played fetch.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.

content.text: Hi! I'm a circus performer, and I love to dance. What do you like to do for fun?
I just graduated high school with honors, and I play music on my computer!
That's awesome! I recently went to the park with my dog George. He's a golden retriever.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly. I have two cats.
I love animals! I grew up on a farm.
That must have been so much fun! I grew up in a small town.
It was! I miss living on a farm sometimes.
Me too! I love the fresh air and the open space.
I do too! I'm glad you enjoy playing music. I love to dance.
I love to dance too! I used to take dance lessons when I was younger.
That's awesome! I used to take dance lessons too.
It's so much fun to move your body and express yourself.
I agree! I love the feeling of being free and enjoying myself.
Me too! I think dancing is a great way to stay fit and healthy.
I agree! It's a great way to relieve stress too.
It is! I love dancing to let off some steam.
Me too! It's so much fun!
